name: Acu Point Locator - Large
description:
Used to find and treat the correspondence points.  

The Acu-point locator is a hi-tech device which acts as an electronic "gate"(diode) to allow energetic flow in one direction only.

The silver end is used for point sedation and the gold end for energetic tonification. Each probe tip is spring loaded for constant pressure

name: Ankle Therapy
description:
The Ultimate Weight Loss Program! Lose pounds by not changing anything of your present eating habits. By investing in fun Ankle Therapy for only few minutes a day, you could see and feel dramatic and incredible results. Just do as little as ten drops on each ankle and gradually increase the amount. Just two sessions of Ankle Therapy a day could also bring you amazing benefits for many various troubles with gout, athletes foot, hemorrhoid, blood pressure related problems, and etc. 'Poor circulation of blood may lead to all kinds of illness!' Blood circulate freely is keeping every cell healthy when there is a balance between the amount of blood pumped by heart and the amount of blood returning to heart. Blood flows down, but doesn't flow up sufficiently in a troubled body. As a result, the accumulated waste matter brings illness to the body. It is natural to get into trouble with organs when the right amount of blood doesn't return from liver, kidney, pancreas, intestines due to the problems of the organs and the body. Ankle Therapy could also bring great results for diabetics, eye sight, hypertension, constipation, backache, and etc. Great results that Well Being Creator members and people had experienced: Weight Loss, Allergy, Alzheimer's Disease & Memory, Anxiety, Arthritis, Asthma, Back Pain, Blood circulation, Bones, Joints & Muscles, Brain & Nervous System, Cancer, Cholesterol, Cold & Flu, Depression, Diabetes, Digestive Health, Ears & Hearing, Eyes & Vision, Headache & Migraine, Heartburn, High Blood Pressure, Leukemia, Mental Health, Nutrition, Obesity, Osteoporosis, Pain Management, Pregnancy, Respiratory Health, Rheumatoid Arthritis, Sexual Health, Skin Conditions, Sleep, Staying Young, Stress, Stroke, Urinary Health, Women's Health, and etc. Disclaimer: Anecdotal evidence only. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product(s) is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Consult with your Health Care Practitioner before starting this or any other program. Basically, use common sense and all the tools at your disposal, when it comes to your health and well-being! There is a place for every modality, when used properly. For the best result;
  1. Never over-exercise the Ankle Therapy.
  2. Start with as little as ten drops, twice a day and gradually increase the amount of exercise.
  3. Doing too much could cause swollen feet, nausea, temporary dizziness, cold symptoms, and etc.
  4. You might even experience the symptoms that you had had previously, but this is just a sign of your body getting better.
  5. Above symptoms are only temporary and will disappear. However, start slow to avoid them.

name: Baby Mugwort
description:
The secret super herb Great benefit for:
  • Irregular period, PMS, Helps skin trouble
  • Make digestive system healthy
  • Helps to sleep better and rest
  • Helps circulation of blood and lymphatic system
  • High blood pressure, cancer prevention
  • Constipation
  • and stroke
Serving directions: Add a teaspoonful of Baby Mugwort TM in a cup of hot water. Wait a few minutes while enjoying rich aroma of Baby Mugwort TM. The steam of Baby Mugwort TM will also disinfect the areas that touch. WARNING: Never use during pregnancy as Mugwort could cause uterine contractions, hence, possible miscarriage. Always remember, before starting any herbal supplement, talk to your doctor first. Disclaimer: Anecdotal evidence only. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product(s) is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Consult with your Health Care Practitioner before starting this or any other program. Use common sense and all the tools at your disposal, when it comes to your health and well-being! There is a place for every modality, when used properly.

name: Foot Massager - Gold
description: Massaging pad from KHT. Aluminum protrusion helps the body temperature keep warm and has an ionic property of activating the cells and nerves while gold plated protrusions makes the bodies bio-electricity activating much greater. When you walk in place or run for your foot exercise, it may cause some pain due to strong pressure of the aluminum protrusion. In this case, you can cover the foot massager with a towel to lessen strong pressure. Then, you can feel less pain and feel instant relief to tired aching feet by stimulating the sole of your feet and give a fantastic energetic cooling effect to the feet and body. Therefore, it is essential to walk in place or run on KHT Foot Massager for about 30 to 60 minutes or so every day. This KHT Foot Massager can be used with or without socks or the towel for the beginners.
